name: Skyboy Minis: Space Tablut
description:
Tablut is an ancient board game with orthogonal goals. One side attempts to capture the opposing team's king. The other side tries to get their king safely to the edge of the board.

Space Tablut is Tablut... in Space. With spaceships. It is a 3D re-skin of Tablut using the same rules. Also like the boardgame, Space Tablut is designed for two-players.

Sounds by @DanWishman.
